channel.title: Help please!

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @nwe_luigi2 nwe luigi2
item.description:
@nwe_luigi2 wrote:

i got specs but i cant make it for my own oppenent only i use this method:

[code]case 29138:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) //dds
{
Whipspec();
}
break;

case 4169:
{
startAnimation(811);
charge(308, absY, absX);
}
break;

case 29163:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) //dscimmy
{
startAnimation(451);
gfxface(347, 0);
actionTimer = 14;
attackPlayersWithin(-1, 50, 4);
}

{

}

txt4 = “RAARRRRRGGGGGHHHHH!”;
